text: Josip Alebić (also known as Jozo or Joško; 7 January 1947 – 8 March 2021)Preminuo olimpijac Josip Alebić was a Croatian sprinter. He was part of the 400 metres races. He competed for Yugoslavia in the 400 m and 4 × 400 m relay events in the 1972, 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. Alebić died on 8 March 2021, aged 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Croatian athletes Category:Olympians for Yugoslavia Category:Olympians for Croatia Category:Sprinters
title: Josip Alebić
